title: OMG I LOVE THE NEW POPPY!!!!
body:
Her abilities are pretty cool and work well with how i play, but i don't care about that!
her personality is too amazing, her joke is awesome, i will play her just for her character rather than however powerful she turns out to be.

Her full facial animation is fantastic and she is voiced by Sakura from Naruto.

replies.body:
I had my last bash fest with the old poppy last night She will be missed!

In saying that I'm quite excited to try out the new version. I'm hoping she will work well in Jungle.

i have to say, the unique 1v5 plays of the old poppy will be missed, but the new one has her own potential, she's just as (if not more) un-gankable as Azir and Gnar now.

I'm sure she will work well in the jungle, her Q is a good AoE camp clear and her E is a good banking tool, and her R should be great at stopping counterganks, but i have yet to try it.
